long_description: Our REI Travel Sewing Kit is sure to meet all your mending needs, letting you replace a button or fix a hem while on the road. Kit contains 18 different colors of thread, a threader, scissors, safety pins, sewing needles, pins, buttons and a thimble. All items come stowed in a compact zippered case with textured polyurethane finish.
short_description: Our REI Travel Sewing Kit is sure to meet all your mending needs, letting you replace a button or fix a hem while on the road.
